website_summaries.verdict: The Asus F556UA-AB32 is a capable 15-inch desktop-replacement laptop that offers respectable features and performance for its under-$400 price.
pros: Good value and performance for the price

customer_reviews.title: It's a good laptop, but at the time of writing the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good laptop, but at the time of writing the description is incorrect. It is NOT a quad core i7 7700, it is a dual core i7500U and that's quite a difference. With this in mind, it is still a good value laptop. In my opinion, the compromises have been made in the chassis - the screen has quite a lot of flex; and also the hard drive which seems a bit slow. When monitoring with Task Manager, I regularly see the disk usage stuck at 100% with correspondingly poor performance. Apart from that, it's very good - attractive, light, good performance and good value.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with my new ASUS
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my new ASUS, bar the speed. I use it for graphic design work and expected it to be much faster bearing in mind the high spec. However, the colours are great. The battery lasts a long time which has come in handy. If you're planning to carry it to work every day or travel with it, as I've had to do a lot,.it might be a little too heavy. Nevertheless, a good all-rounder.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Theochari

customer_reviews.title: Spec for spec I couldn't get any better
customer_reviews.text: I'm really pleased with my choice, i spent a lot of time searching for a laptop around this price and spec for spec I couldn't get any better with the i7 intel processor and 8GB of RAM, it's speedy enough for day to day. Still getting used to Windows 10, not a huge fan yet if i'm honest, but that's not really the laptops fault. Only negative is that the colour is certainly not black! It is a brown/midnight purple colour which i don't really like, but I've purchased need a laptop skin to fix this.
customer_reviews.author: Arran

customer_reviews.title: excellent laptop for the money
customer_reviews.text: The mousepad will turn into an annoyance over time, as you will have difficulties with it, due to the buttons being on the same touch-sensitive pad instead of separate buttons. And the scrolling feature (swiping two fingers up/down) sometimes randomly stops working, a restart will fix that. Also should you use Control to open new tabs, and scroll, sometimes it gets stuck and zooms in on the webpage. Other than that, excellent laptop for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Simon A.

customer_reviews.title: Bad seller and product not value for money
customer_reviews.text: This notebook is not value for money because for 500£ you can buy a laptop which works definitely better. I sent it back because it got blocked several times while it's doing windows updates. For that price, you can buy a faster notebook than this one. Another complaint is about the seller, he spent a lot of time to process the refund and to give me my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Luca

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last 2 years of minimal usage
customer_reviews.text: Nine days after talk to an expert expires, the laptop dies. Purchased this 2 years and 9 days ago. Minimal usage over the 2 years as I use my work laptop most of the time. Used today, it crashed. Wouldn’t turn back on - entered recovery mode and has now been stuck at 1%.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Got this laptop as a teaching tool for my grandson. He never tires of telling me how fast it is even though he multitasks. He is very happy with what santa brought him.
customer_reviews.author: grumpy

customer_reviews.title: Not a good model
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is a slow model, it always get stuck, even with the capacity it has the CPU is always running high percentage
customer_reviews.author: Creed

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - waste of money. Be warned.
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed with this product. I payed a lot of money for this laptop that stopped working - won’t turn on, and both the seller and manufacturer are just not interested in doing anything about it.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Well pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop for the price quick, sleek and packs a punch. beautiful screen and speakers are excellent, if you're not a gamer and want a good laptop look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Pink

customer_reviews.title: Easily the best lap top I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best lap top I have owned, had to retire my Acer I5 as was running hot but this ASUS I7 is in a different league, excellent all round
customer_reviews.author: Gilby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Fast
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Fast, good screen, decent battery life, feels well, still working perfectly after more than 1 year of intense use.
customer_reviews.author: Vivelafrance

customer_reviews.title: A pleasure to use
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic laptop. Reliable and a pleasure to use. Looks smart
customer_reviews.author: Sooz

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Only used it briefly so far but very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap build. Heard nothing from box limited.
customer_reviews.text: The thing fell apart. Fortunately Box were very helpful and gave a full refund no questions or hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: Had it for few weeks, powerful, fast and really nice laptop. UPDATE: After using it everyday for over 2 years, performance is still good - really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Dump the Gimmicks!
customer_reviews.text: Solid build, good display and does most things well, also has decent storage but I'd dump all the Microsoft gimmicks that comes with it asap, especially the truly awful Office 365 and accompanying Outlook which will hold your files and email accounts to ransom when the free trial ends. One big criticism is that it's not easy to navigate around the laptop without a mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbymax

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Laptop. At £469 an absolute bargain compared to other retailers. As for the laptop itself. So far it has been brilliant. With i7 - it is seriously fast. Great speakers for music etc. Really nice vibrant display. So far battery has been good. I was a bit concerned but so far has been good. If you do regular web browsing etc then it will use the juice up quicker. Keyboard is really nice crisp easy touch. Its a really great all round laptop. Love the fact is i7 with everyday and social use.
customer_reviews.author: Nafees Iqbal

customer_reviews.title: good battery life
customer_reviews.text: Did the research,bought the machine! Does exactly what I expected. Fast enough for my video editing (with i7 processor), good battery life, decent screen, good sound. Couldn't have done better at the price - but Amazon packaging was poor and French post office very rough. More by luck than anything else the laptop was undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F

customer_reviews.title: Sadly let down Twice!!
customer_reviews.text: Problems with screen on first one, (different colour on one side to the other); Factory reset as told, but no good. Second one kept turning itself off even after just turned on! From receipt. So that one went back too.. Replaced with an Acer & much happier. Thank goodness for Amazons assistance & all their patience with me trying to sort & then setting up the returns. Pity because I liked the look etc, but my 7 year old laptop worked better, & this was meant to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs G Steadman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice - so far. I'm still exploring this computer's many capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Little

customer_reviews.title: Poor piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is constantly freezing an I mean on an everyday basis and the touch-pad stops working after 10 mins of usage. I have had the laptop for about a month and it has been a poor buy. I would not recommend this at all. It seems to freeze at every opportunity, as soon as I connect my external hard drive, play a video or play a game.
customer_reviews.author: Sajith

customer_reviews.title: ALL GOOD
customer_reviews.text: The shipment was in time...and the computer is perfect...everything okay. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Candelaria D.

customer_reviews.title: A sleek good looking laptop
customer_reviews.text: A sleek good looking laptop, robust and well put together. As one would expect from the spec it is a solid fast performer, I use it mainly for office work. On the negative side there is no indicators for caps or number lock, very irritating, there is also no switch to turn the wireless on and off other than aeroplane mode from the start menu. For many the lack of a manual in any form will be a major problem. A good machine let down.
customer_reviews.author: Johnboy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent computer ideal for what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Excellent computer ideal for what I wanted, not just out as I wanted to install linux on it, Dynamic GPT hard disk which allows over 100 partitions allowing me to install 6/8 different distro's. I did wonder about the battery suppose life of 1,000 charges with little lost of possible computer time with each charge even after 800 charges, but after approx. month 20/25 charges still at 94.5% staying about that level for the last 4 charges. I have now bought another one for my partner whose computer is about 4 years old with no battery life left. Thank you Asus for producing a excellent computer at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: DENNIS

customer_reviews.title: notebook
customer_reviews.text: Received the notebook befor the delivery date which was really good. The notebook is fantastic and easy to use. Down side i tried to register the notebook on the ASUS website but could not as it was already registered to someone else. Contacted customer services who said there have removed the registration only to find it was not done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother!
customer_reviews.text: Slow worse than my 8year old pc. Kept hanging then not shutting down.Restarted to a black screen. For that money very poor. Never buy Asus again. Replacement from Amazon exactly the same.
customer_reviews.author: James Houston

customer_reviews.title: Not good !!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is not fast enough for the price . I found it very slow and I don't recommend it .
customer_reviews.author: Jose Magalhaes Ribeiro

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this computer!
customer_reviews.text: The worst computer I've ever bought. I't even slower than my previous ( broken one). I wouldn't recommend it to anyone! I bought it just to use internet browser and print labels but unfortunately it's even to slow for that. After 2 days of using it I had several "Program isn't responding" notification. You need to know that I had only Google Chrome and Dymo Labels installed so it shouldn't have worked so slow. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ula Bear

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice machine for the price, plenty of power with the i7.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant laptop, Nice and quick due to the i7 cpu, Bought this to replace my ageing acer laptop, Only bought to edit drone videos and 4K videos and it handles them with ease, No problems here as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: Screen is very cheap and of poor quality regardless of the specs given
customer_reviews.text: Very loud fan, which is badly placed. Screen is very cheap and of poor quality regardless of the specs given. Very dissapointed & have returned item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT ARRIVED AT 11:00AM AND IT WAS BACK ON ITS BOX BY 4:00PM:  A POOR QUALITY NOTEBOOK
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy an upgrade of the K56C we have that it is excellent. Unfortunately, the X556UA is made of cheap plastic with sharp edges. The DVD drive is flimsy and the keyboard and pad are noisy and you can hear the click all the time. I disliked the smart eye something that makes the screen yellow. I did not like the resolution, I could not see clearly even with my glasses. No more Asus, I will try a Dell.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not work properly since the day I opened it
customer_reviews.author: D S Sagoo

customer_reviews.title: Although its not a problem with ASUS as such but they need to do proper testing and reject a bad software from microsoft
customer_reviews.text: I am getting multiple issues from the first day I got this laptop. The issues are mostly with Windows 10. Although its not a problem with ASUS as such but they need to do proper testing and reject a bad software from microsoft.
customer_reviews.author: Piyush Kothari

customer_reviews.title: Worked quite well initially, but had to reset everything ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked quite well initially, but had to reset everything under direction from their help desk then had to return it as broken. Also a big design fault there is no caps buttton
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The laptop its very good for this money
customer_reviews.text: The laptop its very good for this money, pretty fast, and easy. I give 3 stars becouse when i started for the first time i heard a funny noise. The fan touch something, i was so happy i received after 2 weeks that i repaired myself instead of waiting another 2 weeks or more. With a knife and a screwdriver and a knife i separated the fan from the problem. But the laptop is fine :)
customer_reviews.author: Poe

customer_reviews.title: No operation manual with this machine
customer_reviews.text: The machine has no light come up to let you know when your in Caps Lock, and no light come up to let you know when your number lock is on. The machine also came with no instruction manual to let you know about the key board or what happens when you press the buttons from F1 through to F12. I went on line to look for a suitable manual to download and to my surprise, there wasn't one. The machine looks pretty slick in black but you better know your way around laptop keyboards as there is no information that comes with the machine which has left me feeling just a little frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: David Thompson

product_meta.title: ASUS VivoBook X556UA-DM326T 15.6 inch HD Notebook (Intel Core i7-6500, 8 GB RAM, 1 TB HDD, HD 1920x 1080 Screen, Windows 10) - Black
product_meta.description:
Style Name:6th Generation i7-6500UASUS X Series laptops are powered by the latest 6th-generation Intel Core i7 processor with up to 8 GB RAM (expandable to 16 GB), and Intel HD Graphics 520. With Windows 10 pre-installed, X Series is ideal for daily computing and entertainment tasks. 

To ensure high quality images, ASUS Splendid Technology has colour temperature correction to reproduce richer, deeper colours. Most LED panels emit blue light - the main cause of macular degeneration and retinal problems. ASUS Eye Care mode effectively reduces blue light levels by up to 33 per cent to make reading comfortable, and to protect you from potential eye fatigue and other ailments.

ASUS X Series gives you a wide array of connectivity options that include USB 3.0 Type-C, HDMI and VGA ports, a 3-in-1 SD/SDHC/SDXC card reader, and more to ensure compatibility with various peripherals and devices. The reversible USB Type-C port ensures a proper connection every time, right-side up, or upside down. USB Type-C gives you data transmission speeds of up to 5 Gbit/s - almost 10 times that of USB 2.0. You can transfer photos, music and even large video files in a fraction of the time - transferring a movie with a file size of 2 GB takes less than two seconds.




BOX CONTAINS
1 x Asus X556UA Notebook
Connection and Power Cables
User Documentation
feature_bullets: It features four visuals modes which can be accessed with a single click
Vivid mode optimises contrast for browsing photos, watching videos and movies
Eye Care mode reduces blue light levels and is ideal when you are reading for long hours
Normal mode has been tuned for daily tasks, while manual mode is for enhanced colour adjustments
ASUS VivoBook series laptops can be specced up to a Full HD (1920 x 1080) resolution display

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars67 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
